constituent: star, sun, day, life, This is Your Life, cell, drop, grow up
koohiiStory1: The sun is the nearest star to the only planet with life - Earth.
koohiiStory2: Sun is a star that has given life. Can´t say that of any other stars yet.
readingExamples: 星座 (せいざ), 流星 (りゅうせい), 衛星 (えいせい), 星 (ほし)
words:
火星(かせい): Mars (planet)
星座(せいざ): constellation
惑星(わくせい): planet
衛星(えいせい): satellite
星(ほし): star
